USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- SELECT data from a folder (*)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- SELECT data from sub-folders (**)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- Filter the sub-folders (**)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- Use more than 1 wild card character
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- File metadata function filename()
SELECT
    TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- Count records per file
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename()

-- Limit data using filename()
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename()


-- Use filepath()
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS file_path,
    result.filepath(2) AS file_path,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);


-- Use filepath() in where clause
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) AS file_path,
    result.filepath(2) AS file_path,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) ='2020' AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);
